0.5.name: wordpress/flexible-hreview
0.5.description:
Flexible hReview lets you add an hReview to a Post, then show that review anywhere on your site using the function or the shortcode. Also available on GitHub: https://github.com/SteveBarnett/Flexible-hReview.

The options page lets you set:

  • field names for multi-dimensional reviews
  • the maximum rating
  • whether or not to calculate and display an average of the ratings
  • characters for before and after the rating text
